Posts.Content: jlynnbain1031 wrote: hi all. i have been reading all your stories for the last month and really think you all are amazing women ! don't know how you do it ! i found a lump, went for a diagnostic mammo then ulrasound. had the biopsy because they found a solid mass in right breast and a nodule in the left. birad of 4 in right breast. biopsy came back to be breast cancer, although i prayed my heart out it wouldn't be but now scheduled this thurs for lumpectomy and wire in both breasts. i am a mess. i have three kids. my oldest is 23, had her at 16, and i have a 9 yr old and a 5 yr old. also have an 8 month old grandson and a wonderful loving husband. i have a huge support team and wonderful family and friends. i have already ordered the pink bracelets and my family and friends are wearing them with pride ! anyways, they took 1.3 out of my almost 2cm lump and i do have IDC. they said chemo and radiation straight to the breast. both of my great grandmas had breast cancer and i am considering a double masectomy. don't want to jump the gun if i don't have too though ! can anyone help me out. i have been short of breath but i think its my nerves a little. i know they can get breast cancer but i am so scared of spread. they are going to check my lymph nodes during surgery and also my surgeon didnt' feel anything swollen under my arms. is this a good sign ? i don't know where else to turn and hope for some good stories from all you wonderful women. i am so sorry you all have went through this. i feel your pain. this has been the worst time of my life. i know with god, family and friends and all of you i will win ! i have so much faith in god but i am scared, i am human ! is IDC curable and what if it is in a lymph node or two ? please help with anything you can. i just want my life back !!! i am so sick, cant eat or anything ! don't even want to get up in the morning ! HELP please ! thanks so much for listening ! jody bain Dx 6/25/2010, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 2/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2
